means: 巨浪，如波涛滚滚而来之物

sentence.Network_en: The white sails billow with the breezes they catch.
sentence.Network_cn: 一张张白帆随着微风舞动。

sentence.Network_en: An angry billow almost swallowed that ship.
sentence.Network_cn: 怒涛几乎吞没了那条船.

sentence.Network_en: A door shuts with a bang and curtains billow into the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 房门砰地一声关上了,窗帘被风翻卷着吹向屋内.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old Norse bylgja

entry.def: When something made of cloth billows, it swells out and moves slowly in the wind.

example.ex: The curtains billowed in the breeze...
example.tran: 窗帘在微风中鼓了起来。

example.ex: Her pink dress billowed out around her.
example.tran: 她粉红色的连衣裙鼓了起来。

entry.def: When smoke or cloud billows, it moves slowly upwards or across the sky.

example.ex: ...thick plumes of smoke billowing from factory chimneys...
example.tran: 工厂烟囱冒出的滚滚浓烟

example.ex: Steam billowed out from under the bonnet.
example.tran: 引擎盖下喷出滚滚的蒸汽。

entry.def: A billow of smoke or dust is a large mass of it rising slowly into the air.

example.ex: ...smoke stacks belching billows of almost solid black smoke.

means.word_mean: 1. rise up as if in waves;

sentences.sentence: "The soldiers billowed across the muddy riverbed"

means.word_mean: 3. rise and move, as in waves or billows;

auth_sentence.content: Black smoke continues to billow from several buildings at the port.
auth_sentence.res_content: Black smoke continues to billow from several buildings at the port.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Black smoke continues to billow from several buildings at the port.

auth_sentence.content: To the billow the fountain calls.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To the billow the fountain calls.

auth_sentence.content: When his waters billow thus, Dark storms and wind Incite them.
auth_sentence.res_content: When his waters billow thus, Dark storms and wind Incite them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When his waters billow thus, Dark storms and wind Incite them.

means.word_mean: 巨浪, 如波涛滚滚而来之物

sentences.en: Billows of smoke blown across the road by the wind made my eyes water.
sentences.cn: 被风吹过路面的滚滚浓烟使我泪流满面。

sentences.en: Clouds of dust billowed out as the cars passed.
sentences.cn: 汽车驶过时扬起滚滚尘土。

sentences.en: The national flag is billowing in the breeze.

jushi.english: The ship was tossed by the ocean billow.
jushi.chinese: 海轮在大洋巨浪上颠簸。

jushi.english: Billows of smoke were belching from the chimney.
jushi.chinese: 滚滚浓烟从烟囱中冒出。
